page.title: 13Transport in rural Sowerby
page.content: Roads The A168 runs through this area carrying heavy goods traffic to and from Teeside and the North East. Tanker traffic carrying chemicals from Teeside uses this road as it is the main link road from the A1 at Dishforth to the A19. It by-passes the town of Thirsk in the West. The A19 has been greatly improved in recent years so is a very popular alternative to the A1 for those travelling to and from Newcastle and Teeside. A filling station and cafe is situated near the turn off for Thirsk convenient for North bound traffic.
